post.body: I can't wait for everyone to play at the new year's eve party! And we have Lego batman too!
that's sounds difficult! Hehe!
ur the best hubby!
I don't think so?
then u prob saw me backstage for the last show as one of the medic chaperones! I was sitting right in front of the green room!
really? As cast choir or guest choir?
making them? U mean they GET TO! hehe!
what title would they give that in football? In baseball it might be the sub pinch hitter!
I hope so too! To clear it up I'll just say...I'M MARRIED TO @drastudio!!!
for some reason has that song "8 6 7 5 3 0 9" stuck in my head! Must cram in some anberlin instead! Any album will do cuz we have them all!
I can't love a thief anymore! ~Anberlin
can't believe I haven't posted anything since last Friday! I hope everyone had a good christmas! The new year is only a few days away!
is finally heading back to poinciana but not for sleep! We'll be playing games with the Chesser fam and kimmy kim kim...Lynch of course! :)
doing something like black Friday shopping in the Loop before going to MGM (Hollywood Studios) for free thanks to Candlelight! :)
had a great Christmas...gifts, steak dinner, movie watching, and now Epcot's Candlelight for a double performance! :) I heart Christmas!
Merry Christmas to all! Hope to see u tonight at Candlelight in Epcot! I love Disney as a Christmas tradition! :D
playing original mario games with the chesser fam! Sadly our cats do not like eachother even though neither have hissed before!
As Kermit the Frog sings in the Muppet Christmas Carol...there's only one more sleep 'til Christmas! :D
is so tired these days! But I had a fun day with my hubby @drastudio! Countdown to Christmas...only 2 days! :D
Last Christmas I gave you my heart. But the very next day you gave it away. This year to save me from tears I'll give it to someone special!
